summary: This is a brief email exchange between Geoffrey Berman and an unnamed recipient regarding scheduling a meeting about Epstein properties. The email indicates a request to schedule the meeting for Friday and a confirmation that the schedule is light.

persons.name: Geoffrey Berman
persons.context: He is the sender of the initial email inquiring about scheduling an Epstein property meeting for Friday.

events.title: Proposed Epstein Property Meeting
events.description: A meeting to discuss Epstein properties was proposed to be scheduled for Friday, May 22, 2020.

keyFacts: An email exchange on May 21, 2020, discusses scheduling a meeting about Epstein properties.
Geoffrey Berman, then US Attorney for the Southern District of New York, was involved in the correspondence.
The proposed meeting date was for Friday, May 22, 2020, indicating ongoing legal or investigative activity related to Epstein's assets.
